original_text: And the ransomed of the Lord shall return, and come to Zion with songs and everlasting joy upon their heads: they shall obtain joy and gladness, and sorrow and sighing shall flee away.
korean_text: 여호와의 속량함을 받은 자들이 돌아오되 노래하며 시온에 이르러 그들의 머리 위에 영영한 희락을 띠고 기쁨과 즐거움을 얻으리니 슬픔과 탄식이 사라지리로다

sentences.original_text: And the ransomed of the Lord
with songs and everlasting joy upon their heads
they shall obtain joy and gladness
and sorrow and sighing shall flee away
